name: RAPT Touch
overview:
RAPT is redefining interaction using touchscreen technology.

Fueled by this vision of ubiquitous multi-touch products, surfaces and interfaces, RAPT is in the early stages of establishing itself in the $17 Billion touchscreen industry. RAPT has developed its disruptive technology from infancy to productization to trial with beta customers. In the last twelve months, RAPT has rapidly expanded from 3 to 15 full-time employees, established a worldwide presence (including basing the senior management team in Silicon Valley), and expanded its customer base.

RAPT is poised to become the technology leader in enabling ubiquitous touch-screens. The company’s proprietary, multi-touch technology offers a radically low-cost and technically superior alternative to today’s multi-touch technologies. This means manufacturers can include touchscreen technology in a wide variety of products without sacrificing cost or functionality. Customers today are in the Consumer Electronics Industry with multi-touch technology being used in Tablet Computers, PC’s, Smartphones and Personal Entertainment Devices. RAPT’s technology is addressing the current and emerging needs of today’s touchscreen products which has far-reaching implications in sectors such as Health Care, Government, Automotive and Retail.
